definition: to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
open to the view of all/spacious/to open wide/to disclose

sentences.english: The second chapter for urban open space of relevant basic research.
sentences.chinese: 第二章爲城市開敞空間的相關基礎研究。

sentences.english: The powerhouse is designed to be of shaft and semi-underground type and the substation of open type.
sentences.chinese: 廠房採用豎井半地下式佈置，開敞式變電站。

sentences.english: The open spaces differ according to aspect.
sentences.chinese: 開敞空地隨方位而不同。

sentences.english: Among all factors influencing its actual functions and effects, the structure of the Green Open Space is undoubtedly the crucial one.
sentences.chinese: 而綠色開敞空間的結構是決定其功能能否優化的關鍵。

sentences.english: The maximum inscribed circle diameter on the steel bar pitch of the grating .
sentences.chinese: 鋼格板開敞通孔的最大內接圓直徑。

sentences.english: Chapter four is optimization countermeasures on open space of yanji city.
sentences.chinese: 第四章爲延吉市開敞空間的優化對策。

sentences.english: The kitchen has slide away windows that open directly to the garden.
sentences.chinese: 廚房擁有向花園開敞的推拉窗。

sentences.english: The hallway runs through the entire house with a single-arm open staircase rising to the top of the building.
sentences.chinese: 走廊貫穿整個房屋，單臂開敞樓梯上到建築的頂部。

sentences.english: Contrary to the widely opened living room, the library on the semi-basement is a space for silence and moderation.
sentences.chinese: 與開敞的起居室相反，書房是安靜舒適的半地下空間。

sentences.english: Its expansive atmosphere aims to fill the role of an inviting open space on Ginza Dori .
sentences.chinese: 開敞的氣氛是爲了在銀座大街的露天廣場吸引遊人。

sentences.english: PSCO: Are you sure that the liferafts can be transferred from side to side on a single open deck?
sentences.chinese: 你確認救生筏能在單一開敞甲板舷對舷移動嗎？

sentences.english: Downstairs, the architects included an open-concept kitchen, living and dining space.
sentences.chinese: 樓下包括開敞式的廚房，起居室和餐廳。

sentences.english: The third chapter of open space for research in yanji city.
sentences.chinese: 第三章爲延吉市開敞空間特徵研究。

sentences.english: Barn B, meanwhile is an open-air shed made from a lattice frame of locally harvested bamboo.
sentences.chinese: 農舍B是一個當地產柱子構架起來的開敞倉庫。
